message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your perspective, but $6,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $9,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
